title: Pick a Platform (iOS or Android)
description: Start with native development. Learn Swift for iOS or Kotlin for Android. Understand the ecosystem and tools (Xcode/Android Studio).

title: Cross-Platform Development
description: Learn a cross-platform framework like Flutter (Dart) or React Native (JS). This is highly valuable in the job market.

title: Intermediate Mobile Dev
description: Build complex apps with local storage, push notifications, animations, and third-party libraries. Publish apps to stores.

title: Senior Mobile Engineer
description: Architect scalable apps, handle security, offline-first capabilities, and lead mobile teams.
